infoSections.text: **t-Distributed Stochastic Neighbor Embedding (t-SNE)** is a dimensionality reduction algorithm used in software pipelines for visualizing high-dimensional neural data. It helps cluster similar neural activity patterns, making it useful for feature exploration and anomaly detection in brain signal processing.

tasks.taskDescription: Read this [article] to understand t-SNE and watch these videos to help you get a better understanding:
